title: Identification of socket-outlets protected by LPDs
fullText:
Socket-outlets protected by LPDs shall be identified by the specific wordsâ€”
(a)	'RCD PROTECTED' or 'ISOLATION TRANSFORMER PROTECTED';
(b)	'from RCD X' or 'from LIM X'; and
(c)	'CLEANING PURPOSES ONLY', where applicable.
Exception:
1	Item (a) need not apply to socket-outlets identified 'CLEANING PURPOSES ONLY'.
Each socket-outlet or group of socket-outlets shall be identified (numbered or lettered) in accordance with Clause 2.12.1 to identify the appropriate LIM and overload monitor or the appropriate RCD.
Socket-outlets protected by an LPD shall not have DB/CB identification affixed.
